ComicInfo.Characters: Ellen Ripley,Mork,James T. Kirk,Ash,Sylvester P. Smythe,Alien Queen,Leonard McCoy,Alien Warrior,Hikaru Sulu,Nanny Dickering,Dr. Watson,Jimmy Carter,King Kong,Pavel Chekov
ComicInfo.Title: Oh, Those Long Lines; Shut-Ups; If Mork Appeared in Other TV Shows and Movies; One Afternoon in a Plastic Surgeon's Office; Ten Little Drivers (Representing Millions More); The Cracked World of Disco; Literal Interpretations of Baseball Expressions; You're Going a Little Too Far When...; The Cracked World of Marriage; Cracked Tips for Economizing; The Cracked World of Ambition; When Gambling Becomes Legal in Everyday Life; Allien And How to Watch It; The Way to Conserve Energy!
ComicInfo.Penciller: Howard Nostrand,Don Orehek,John Severin,Bill Ward,Warren Sattler,Su Gumen,Sam Whitehead
